item.title: [Launched] Generally Available: Azure Functions support for Node.js 22
item.description:
Azure Functions support for Node.js 22 is now Generally Available. You
can now develop functions using Node.js 22 locally and deploy them to all Azure
Functions plans on Linux and Windows.Learn more.
